Using R, rCharts, and NVD3 to Visualize Cancer Rates in the US

Aug 2, 2015

A breakdown of where to find the cancer data, how to transform it into an applicable format, and how to create and customize interactive visualizations that can be easily shared.

Cancer: 1999 to 2011

Aug 1, 2015

A look at how cancer rates in the United States changed from 1999 to 2011. Comparison of the most common cancers, as well as comparisons of gender, race, and age.
